Albert Einstein0: “The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.”
J.K. Rowling1: “It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.”
Albert Einstein2: “There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.”

Albert Einstein5: “Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.”
